#anime #anime_art #animegirls #animeart #animesight #animestyle #sight #wtdraw #noscope #nosight #killlakill #Ryuuko #Matoi #MatoiRyuuko

Since quite a few people have asked for this sight, here it is. The Battlefield 3 inspired sight I made for my Leopard 2A7 💥High Explosive💥 video.

The sight is green on standard, and red on "light-up".

If you want to change the "DM11 HE-TF" text, simply follow these instructions.:
1 - Open the sight with .txt or notepad.
2 - Hit ctrl+F and search for DM11.
3 - Change the text to which ever shell name you would like, or you could remove the text entirely.
4 - Save.

If there are any problems with the sight, let me know.
It works for the Leopard 2A7V primarily, but it may not work a...

This sight is for all tanks
This was my first time making my own sight. So dont expect to much

#uk #britain #cn #china #plane #collimator #sight #rocket #uncle_tom #mosquito #mosquitofbmkvi #mosquitofbmk6 #mosquitofbmk18 #mosquitofbmk26 #rp3 #tsetse

Update 11-12-25: Added support for the Mosquito B Mk 16

Sight pack for the Mosquito FB Mk VI, Mk XVIII, Mk 26, and B Mk 16. Includes the 57mm cannon, Uncle Tom rockets, and RP-3 rockets.
Note that the 6pdr cannon sight is accurate at most speeds and angles, but the actual AP shell is bad at normalizing, so try to come in at a flat angle relative to your target's armor plate style. (At a 30-40 degree angle for a T-34 for example)

<...

A muti-scale sight for ZBD-04A, this sight is based on achievements of @__Leontij__ and @叭嘎大帝.
Ranging for 2A72(pot scale) and manual set for 3OF70(line scale).
给ZBD-04A用的多标尺瞄具，基于@__Leontij__ 和 @叭嘎大帝 的成果。
激光测距自动调整机炮密位，100炮密位需要手动滚；黑点是机炮密位，横线是3OF70密位。
#zbd04a #zbd_04a

Sight on the Sturmtiger. to work as artillery or as usual.

Contains:
Marks on the compass for azimuth guidance
Distance scale with markings for adjustments in 10m increments
The distance scale reaches 3 km

If you have any suggestions or questions about my sights, message Nikamine on discord!
Next sight would be for BT-42

German
Artillery
Sturmtiger

No Scope, No Sight, NOTHING!

ONLY ULTRA HARD

Challenge for everyone!

p.s (This is a blk file, you can edit it to make your own sights, it's just a blank canvas)

#all_tanks #alltanks #sight #nosight #noscope #nothing #clearsight #clear #challenge

A sight to work like artillery. Version-2
marks were made for correction by 12.5 meters and marks for correction using a compass.
In the near future I will make a sight for Sturmriger.

if you have ideas or questions about my sights. message me on discord! Nikamine

#zbd04a

CN-ZBD04A-Sight-A1
Zoom :6.0x-11.0x

Usage method : Put the. blk file in the folder of the vehicle，Restart the game，Select a custom sight in Game Options - General Combat Settings
Example : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_zbd_04a

使用说明 : 把.blk文件放到对应载具的文件夹内，重启游戏或重新加载自定义瞄具，在游戏选项-通用战斗设置中选择自定义瞄具。
例 : E:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights\cn_zbd_04a

Sight for BMP-3

Features:
1. 2 marks for accurately shooting missiles;
2. Horizontal reticles for shooting 30mm APDS while moving (or shooting targets having horizontal speed);
3. Circular curves for aiming helicopters with 30mm HEI belt loaded;
4. Prompt for quickly identify selected main weapon (30mm gun or 100mm gun)

Updated on 2024.03.25
Added an alternative with small 50m correction ticks, for fine adjustment while using the IFV as an artillery. (Screenshot appended)

Usage:
- The 2nd and 3rd screenshots shows info about weapon selection prom...

#anime #atago #azur_lane #azurlane #universal

Atago

"Ara! Kawaii shiki-kan ne~"

当前版本：2.35.0.16这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.35.0.16 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.com...

Well that remaster only happened after an hour of the original one, looks like i still have some in me i guess!

More detailed then the predecessor, how you ask?

More lines! precisecely 400 of them! (original had around 300 or so this one has 790 lines...)

So i forgot one thing, i put only the sight file and not the "all_tanks" folder with it, so to use the sight remember to create that file in User Sights if you don't have it already and just put the image file there

Shinji Ikari defense squad

Have fun with this one lads ;)

#Anime #Evangelion #shinji

Hello! This is my first attempt at doing custom content for War Thunder, saw there was some evangelion sights but not a single one for our boy Shinji.

D:

But not anymore! lo and behold a shitty Shinji Ikari custom sight made in 10 minutes!

One day i'll re-do this to a better standard, anyway have fun with it!

and so i did, this one is so bad ong compared to the remaster but it does gives Picasso vibes tho


#Anime #Evangelion #shinji

C-SAS is a collection of all the South African vehicle sights I've ever made, pulled together into one pack for convenience.

Historical:
Olifant Mk.1A sights
Olifant Mk.2 sight (V2 only)
Concept 3 sight (V1 only)
Ratel 90 sight
Eland 90 sight

Fictional:
All Rooikat sights
G6 sights
Ratel 20 sights
Concept 3 sight (V2 only)
Olifant Mk.2 sight (V1 only)
ZA-35
Bosvark
Ystervark
TTD

Peetah your enemies. Sight for all tanks. Low effort.
PEETAH DESTROYED!
HIT!
Put into all tanks folder
Thank you ❤️

Let The Hand Of Stalin Guide You.

I was originally planning to make two versions that have no cross-hairs. Only through Stalin, may we achieve victory.
But, after some feedback, I've decided to add additional versions for those who lack faith.
Now there are four versions.
---------------------------------------------------------------
스탈린의 손이 동무를 이끌 것이오.

원래 조준점이 없는 버전 두개만 올릴 생각이었소. 오직 스탈린을 통해서만 우리들은 승리를 쟁취할 수 있기에.
하지만 동지들의 되먹임을 받고, 아직 믿음이 부족한 이들을 위해 십자선이 있는 버전도 추가했소.
이제 네가지 맛을 즐기시오.

#sights #universal #wife #stalin #stalinium #meme #joke #스탈린
